response.original_title: Elizabeth "Betita" Martinez: San Francisco Foundation Community Leadership Awards 2008
response.overview: Elizabeth "Betita" Martinez, winner of the San Francisco Foundation 2008 Community Leadership Awards (The San Francisco Foundation Award) - for building unity and alliances across traditional racial and gender lines, and for serving as a selfless and inspirational advocate for oppressed peoples around the world.
response.title: Elizabeth "Betita" Martinez: San Francisco Foundation Community Leadership Awards 2008
